title: Build Rankings tab UI in The Lab dashboard
description: Build a new Rankings tab in The Lab dashboard to display all player rankings generated by TKT-236. Sub-navigation for each ranking category. Sortable leaderboard tables with phase/type filters. Consistent styling with existing Lab design system. Responsive layout for mobile. Loads ranking JSON data from data/rankings.js.

florentino_gate.reason: Rankings is the signature Sprint 5 feature.

deliverables: Nav links added to all 8 Lab pages (desktop + mobile)

progress_notes.step_2_build: Created rankings.html (1,892 lines) with full rankings UI. Features: 7 category pill navigation, subcategory drill-down, sortable leaderboard tables, player search (Ctrl+K), pagination (25 per page), gold/silver/bronze rank badges, composite score bars with tier coloring (elite/strong/solid/average), mobile card layout, dark/light theme, methodology footnote explaining all composite formulas. Rankings nav link added to all 8 Lab pages (desktop nav-tabs + mobile nav menus).
progress_notes.step_3_domain_sanity: Andy Flower: All 7 ranking categories display correctly. Phase rankings show expected top performers. Composite methodology footnote accurately describes the weighting system from config/thresholds.yaml. Jose: Data loads from rankings.js (86.9 KB) without errors. Jayson Tatum: Responsive layout works on mobile with card view. Nav consistency achieved across all pages.

step_6_post_note.what_changed: New Rankings tab added as the 3rd nav item (after Teams) across all Lab pages. Full interactive leaderboard UI with 7 categories and 20+ sub-categories.
step_6_post_note.cricket_insight: The UI reveals that Bumrah's #1 bowler composite (94.7) is 12.8 points ahead of #2 Varun Chakravarthy (81.9) — the largest gap at the top of any category. In batting, the top-4 (Klaasen 86.9, Pooran 86.2, SKY 84.0, Head 83.2) are separated by just 3.7 points, suggesting a much more competitive batter landscape.
step_6_post_note.risk: None — additive UI page, no existing functionality affected.
step_6_post_note.usp: First interactive player ranking leaderboard for IPL analytics. Keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+K search, arrow keys for category navigation) and tier visualization make this a scouting tool, not just a stat table.
